Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService")
Remover = script:WaitForChild("Remover")
TankModel = InsertService:LoadAsset(172079556) Tank = TankModel:GetChildren()[1]:Clone() if TankModel and TankModel.Parent then TankModel:Destroy() end
Handle.Transparency = 0
ClientControls = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControls") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControls.Name = "ClientControls" ClientControls.Parent = Tool
ServerControls = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControls") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControls.Name = "ServerControls" ServerControls.Parent = Tool
Damage = 25 ReloadTime = 1.5
Controls = { Forward = {Speed = 25, Value = false}, Backward = {Speed = 12.5, Value = false}, }
Gravity = 196.20
Ammo = Instance.new("Part") Ammo.Name = "Ammo" Ammo.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic Ammo.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block Ammo.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Ammo.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Ammo.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Ammo.Size = Vector3.new(0.75, 0.75, 1) Ammo.CanCollide = true Ammo.Locked = true AmmoMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") AmmoMesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh AmmoMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=28565445" AmmoMesh.TextureId = "" AmmoMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2) AmmoMesh.Parent = Ammo
Equipped = false
ClientControls.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if player ~= Player then return end if Mode == "Click" and PlayerTank and PlayerTank.Parent then if Value then local TargetPoint pcall(function() TargetPoint = ServerControls:InvokeClient(Player) end) if not TargetPoint or not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false local Projectile = Ammo:Clone() local Randomize = math.random(1, 2) local Color = ((Randomize == 1 and BrickColor.Random()) or (Randomize == 2 and BrickColor.new(math.random(), math.random(), math.random()))) Projectile.BrickColor = Color local Mass = (Projectile:GetMass() * Gravity) local BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(Mass, Mass, Mass) BodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyVelocity.Parent = Projectile Debris:AddItem(Projectile, 5) Projectile.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") Projectile.CFrame = PositionProjectile(TankTorso, 0, -1, (TankTorso.Size.Z / 2) + (Ammo.Size.Z / 2)) * CFrame.Angles(-(math.pi / 2), 0, 0) BodyVelocity.velocity = CFrame.new(TankTorso.Position, TargetPoint).lookVector * 100 Projectile.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if not Hit or not Hit.Parent then return end local HitParent = Hit.Parent if HitParent:IsA("Hat") or HitParent:IsA("Tool") then HitParent = HitParent.Parent end if HitParent == PlayerTank then return end local humanoid = HitParent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and HitParent ~= Character then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) end if Projectile and Projectile.Parent then Projectile:Destroy() end end) wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end elseif Mode == "Key" then local Key = Value.Key local Down = Value.Down if Key == "w" or Key == "w" then Controls.Forward.Value = Down elseif Key == "s" or Key == "s" then Controls.Backward.Value = Down end end end)
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function PositionProjectile(handle, x, y, z) local HandleClone = handle:Clone() local HandleCloneY = HandleClone:Clone() HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90), 0, 0) HandleCloneY.CFrame = HandleCloneY.CFrame - HandleCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * y local HandleCloneZ = HandleCloneY:Clone() HandleCloneZ.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame + HandleClone.CFrame.lookVector * z local HandleCloneX = HandleCloneZ:Clone() HandleCloneX.CFrame = HandleCloneZ.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(90), 0) HandleCloneX.CFrame = HandleCloneX.CFrame - HandleCloneX.CFrame.lookVector * x return HandleCloneX.CFrame end
function GetTotalMass(Parent) local Mass = 0 local function GetMass(Parent) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then Mass = (Mass + v:GetMass()) end GetMass(v) end end GetMass(Parent) return Mass end
function Equipped() Equipped = true Handle.Transparency = 1 Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 if PlayerTank and PlayerTank.Parent then PlayerTank:Destroy() end PlayerTank = Tank:Clone() local Creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator.Name = "Creator" Creator.Value = Player Creator.Parent = PlayerTank local RemoverClone = Remover:Clone() RemoverClone.Disabled = false RemoverClone.Parent = PlayerTank TankHumanoid = PlayerTank:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") TankTorso = PlayerTank:FindFirstChild("Torso") TankHumanoid.MaxHealth = 200 TankHumanoid.Health = TankHumanoid.MaxHealth TankHumanoid.Died:connect(function() if PlayerTank and PlayerTank.Parent then PlayerTank:Destroy() end Humanoid:UnequipTools() end) BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(0, math.huge, 0) BodyGyro.Parent = TankTorso local Mass = (((GetTotalMass(PlayerTank) * Gravity) * 100) / 2) BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(Mass, 0, Mass) BodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyVelocity.Parent = TankTorso PlayerTank.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") TankTorso.CFrame = Torso.CFrame + Torso.CFrame.lookVector * ((Torso.Size.Z / 2) + (TankTorso.Size.Z / 2)) TankTorso.CFrame = TankTorso.CFrame - Vector3.new(0, (PlayerTank:GetModelSize().Y / 2), 0) BodyGyro.cframe = TankTorso.CFrame pcall(function() ServerControls:InvokeClient(Player, "SetCamera", TankHumanoid) end) while Equipped and PlayerTank and PlayerTank.Parent do local TargetPoint pcall(function() TargetPoint = ServerControls:InvokeClient(Player) end) if TargetPoint then BodyGyro.cframe = CFrame.new(TankTorso.Position, TargetPoint) if Controls.Forward.Value then BodyVelocity.velocity = TankTorso.CFrame.lookVector * Controls.Forward.Speed end if Controls.Backward.Value then BodyVelocity.velocity = TankTorso.CFrame.lookVector * -Controls.Backward.Speed end if not Controls.Forward.Value and not Controls.Backward.Value then BodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) end end wait() end pcall(function() ServerControls:InvokeClient(Player, "SetCamera", Humanoid) end) end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false Handle.Transparency = 0 if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 pcall(function() ServerControls:InvokeClient(Player, "SetCamera", Humanoid) end) end if PlayerTank and PlayerTank.Parent then PlayerTank:Destroy() end for i, v in pairs(Controls) do Controls[i].Value = false end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Figure = script.Parent Creator = Figure:WaitForChild("Creator").Value
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
FixCamera = script:WaitForChild("FixCamera")
function DestroyModel() if Player then local Backpack = Player:FindFirstChild("Backpack") if Backpack then local FixCameraClone = FixCamera:Clone() FixCameraClone.Disabled = false FixCameraClone.Parent = Backpack end end Debris:AddItem(Figure, 2) end
if Creator:IsA("Player") then Character = Creator.Character if Character then Character.Changed:connect(function(Property) if not Character.Parent then DestroyModel() end end) else DestroyModel() end else DestroyModel() end

--Made by Luckymaxer
Parent = script.Parent
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera
PossiblePlayer = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Parent)
Player = ((Parent:IsA("Backpack") and Parent.Parent) or (PossiblePlayer and PossiblePlayer)) Character = Player.Character Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
Camera.CameraSubject = Humanoid
Debris:AddItem(script, 2)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players")
Camera = game:GetService("Workspace").CurrentCamera
ClientControls = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControls") ServerControls = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControls")
ServerControls.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if not Humanoid then return end if Mode == "SetCamera" then Camera.CameraSubject = Value else return Humanoid.TargetPoint end end)
function ExecuteControl(Mode, Value) pcall(function() ClientControls:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) end) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() ExecuteControl("Click", true) end) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() ExecuteControl("Click", false) end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) ExecuteControl("Key", {Key = Key, Down = true}) end) Mouse.KeyUp:connect(function(Key) ExecuteControl("Key", {Key = Key, Down = false}) end) end
function Unequipped() end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
